channel.title: [delta][tut]Changing npcs combat/hitpoints and drops![For beginners]
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Changing npcs combat/hitpoints and drops![/size]
Difficulty: 0.5/10 Knowledge Needed: Following instructions Files Edited: npcs.cfg,npcdrops.cfg
Go to your source>config>npc.cfg [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/lollol.png[/img] Combat is 0 you can change that to anything you want.(Im not sure exactly) hitpoints is 0 you can change that to anything you want.(Im sure) Respawn is blank (it means when you kill the npc how long does it take to respawn re appear 60 is 60 seconds) compile and run Note: This also fixes: when you add a custom npc or a new npc Go to npc.cfg copy a code and repast it with your npc id and you must change the combat and hitpoints so you can hit it! [size=24pt]Changing npc drops [/size] go to source>config>npcdrops.cfg My graardor drop : [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/bandosdrop.png[/img] Code: [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/graardor.png[/img]
Explaing code: 1115 is npc id 1107 is item id 1 : how much of the item 2,3 etc. for money like 5000000 etc. 35 :is drop rate, current drop rate for me is: 35% (for bandos umm tasstets i think)
Compile and run
Credits: Me for tut delta for source

item.title: [delta][tut]Changing npcs combat/hitpoints and drops![For beginners]
item.dc:creator: @Thetwistedsnake Thetwistedsnake
item.description:
@Thetwistedsnake wrote:

    [size=36pt]Changing npcs combat/hitpoints and drops![/size]

Difficulty: 0.5/10
Knowledge Needed: Following instructions
Files Edited: npcs.cfg,npcdrops.cfg

Go to your source>config>npc.cfg

lollol.png698×31

Combat is 0 you can change that to anything you want.(Im not sure exactly)
hitpoints is 0 you can change that to anything you want.(Im sure)
Respawn is blank (it means when you kill the npc how long does it take to respawn re appear
60 is 60 seconds) compile and run
Note: This also fixes: when you add a custom npc or a new npc Go to npc.cfg copy a code and repast it with your npc id and you must change the combat and hitpoints so you can hit it!
[size=24pt]Changing npc drops [/size]
go to source>config>npcdrops.cfg
My graardor drop :

Code:

Explaing code:
1115 is npc id
1107 is item id
1 : how much of the item 2,3 etc. for money like 5000000 etc.
35 :is drop rate, current drop rate for me is: 35% (for bandos umm tasstets i think)

Compile and run

Credits:
Me for tut
delta for source

Read full topic
